Paragraph: However , there was a pronounced difference that the PEBDTPD film showed a higher extinction coefficient ( 4.1 × 10^4 cm^-1 at the peak of 675 nm ) than the POBDTPD ( 2.6 × 10^4 cm^-1 at the peak of 673 nm ) , reflecting that the polymer chain packing in PEBDTPD film is better than that in POBDTPD.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PEBDTPD film |
| POBDTPD |

Both PEBDTPD film and POBDTPD are clearly materials mentioned in the paragraph, referring to two different types of polymers.

The only clear "Material Property" entity in the paragraph is "extinction coefficient". The phrase "polymer chain packing" is a characteristic or feature of a material, but it is not a well-defined property in the same way that "extinction coefficient" is.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: However , there was a pronounced difference that the PEBDTPD film showed a higher extinction coefficient ( 4.1 × 10^4 cm^-1 at the peak of 675 nm ) than the POBDTPD ( 2.6 × 10^4 cm^-1 at the peak of 673 nm ) , reflecting that the polymer chain packing in PEBDTPD film is better than that in POBDTPD.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 4.1 × 10^4 cm^-1 at the peak of 675 nm |
| 2.6 × 10^4 cm^-1 at the peak of 673 nm |

Explanation:

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are the measurements of the extinction coefficients for the PEBDTPD and POBDTPD films. These values are:

* 4.1 × 10^4 cm^-1 at the peak of 675 nm (for PEBDTPD)
* 2.6 × 10^4 cm^-1 at the peak of 673 nm (for POBDTPD)

These values are presented as a table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 4.1 × 10^4 cm^-1 |
| 2.6 × 10^4 cm^-1 |

Explanation:

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are the measurements of the extinction coefficients for the PEBDTPD and POBDTPD films. These values are:

* 4.1 × 10^4 cm^-1 (for PEBDTPD)
* 2.6 × 10^4 cm^-1 (for POBDTPD)

The other values in the original table, such as "at the peak of 675 nm" and "at the peak of 673 nm", do not clearly refer to a "Value of material property" and have been removed. These values are related to the wavelength of the peak absorption, but they are not the actual values of the material property being measured (extinction coefficient).
